title: 285: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: GREG’S RECKONING
itunes:title: 285: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: GREG’S RECKONING
description:
Oh Broads… the day has finally come. While Jess is on vacation, Bekah gets into the hometowns episode with returning guest Ari Eastman. Together they navigate the men’s family dynamics and unpack Greg’s massive meltdown.
